title: Low-cost iron nanoparticles for remediation of agricultural pollution: adsorption of herbicides bromoxynil and paraquat
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00835E, Paper
Salma Shad, Nadia Bashir, Iseult Lynch
Green synthesis of 10 nm zero-valent iron nanoparticles (ZVI-NPs) and incorporation into a polymer membrane offers a promising solution for removal of herbicides, bromoxynil and paraquat. 100% removal was achieved in 18â€“25 mins with 0.1 mg ZVI-NPs.
